atg.payment.creditcard
Class AuthorizationAddressVerificationStatus

java.lang.Object
  atg.payment.creditcard.AuthorizationAddressVerificationStatus
All Implemented Interfaces:
CreditCardStatus, PaymentStatus, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CyberCashStatus, CyberSourceStatus
public abstract class AuthorizationAddressVerificationStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements CreditCardStatus

This class defines an address verification(AVS) status, performed by a payment system when an authorization request is submitted. AVS compairs the customer's information provided in the order form against what's on file for the credit card. Only U.S. Banks return this reply information.

See Also:
Serialized Form
